description: Directors Steffen Haars and Flip van der Kuil as well as actors Huub Smit and Wesley van Gaalen will be LIVE in attendance!
synopsis: In 2011, NEW KIDS TURBO rocked Fantastic Fest audiences with its potent brand of Dutch gross-out humor. Now, Fantastic Fest is proud to present the highly anticipated—and very offensive—sequel: NEW KIDS NITRO.
title: New Kids Nitro
